DataElement.preferredDefinition: Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding.:A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial._A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.:The act of making necessary corrections or modifications._The adjustment, if any, of an agent.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The adjustment, if any, of an agent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that a medication schedule was modified through termination of a prescribed regimen of medication.

Concepts.definition: An indication that a medication schedule was modified through termination of a prescribed regimen of medication.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that a medication schedule was modified by subtraction, either by changing the frequency, strength or amount.

Concepts.definition: An indication that a medication schedule was modified by subtraction, either by changing the frequency, strength or amount.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that a medication schedule was modified by addition; either by changing the frequency, strength or amount.

Concepts.definition: An indication that a medication schedule was modified by addition; either by changing the frequency, strength or amount.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that a medication schedule was continued without modification.

Concepts.definition: An indication that a medication schedule was continued without modification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The amount of medicine taken, or radiation given, at one time.

Concepts.definition: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
